name: Seadra
description: The Dragon Pokémon. Touching the back fin causes numbness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit with a melee attack, roll a 1d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of poison damage equal to this Pokémon’s proficiency modifier.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: On a critical hit made by this Pokémon, triple the dice roll instead of doubling it.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by Self Destruct and Explosion moves.
